message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal for you, and it's close to my minimum price. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I'm only able to pay up to $10000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $10000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little further to $10500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested in this offer.
